page.title: 01The Wheatsheaf Inn, Egton
page.content:
**{The Wheatsheaf Inn Egton}**
The pub bar is{200}years old. The best day for selling is{Egton Show}day, because there are a lot of people around. The pub was first owned by the {Foster}family.
The pub used to be a farm and they grew everything. They even brewed their own beer !
They get their food from{Cheshire, {Manchester, York}and{Sleights.}They came to{Egton}because the business was for sale and they liked the building.
The pub was built in{1887,}probably by someone local. When{Egton}was a Market the owners used to make{60}breakfasts a day ! By Emma Galloway
